channel.title: astro-erudite
channel.description: astro-erudite is a opinionated, unstyled blogging template—built with Astro, Tailwind, and shadcn/ui.

item.title: v1.5.0: “A Callout Component for Nerds”
item.description: A quick update introduces our first content-based component: the callout!

item.title: v1.3.0: “Patches in Production”
item.description: Whenever you depend on Node packages with missing maintainers, patching becomes a necessary evil.

item.title: The State of Static Blogs in 2024
item.description: There should not be a single reason why you would need a command palette search bar to find a blog post on your own site.
